attributes.action: Give more fitting memorials to those who gave their lives on the Normandy Beaches
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why is it that Utah, Omaha and Juno Beaches in Normandy have fitting memorials to those who gave their lives, and yet there isn't even a signpost on "Gold" beach, and "Sword" Beach has minigolf and a casino?  Does the U.S. care more about the sacrifice than the British? I want to see tributes to these men and women who gave their lives.   Lest we forget.
